item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 190
item.description: On Monday, the three men rest here to treat wild dogs. When the wild dogs learned that their lives were picked up, they felt more lucky. In private, they were confused about their unexpected bravery. However, after this time, the relationship between Zhouxian and Xiaohuan has become closer. After all, they have lived and died together. After all, Zhouxian doesn’t have the same cold words to him as before. When he is asked to work, he is still the same as before.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 189 ghost Road
item.description: The night was deep. The wild dog Taoist, who has entered the hell’s gate but is lucky to be pulled back, has been bandaged up several wounds on his body at the moment. It seems that he is still weak, but lying on the ground, his breath is weak but gentle, and he is no longer worried about his life. Xiao Huan, who saved the wild dog Taoist priest, is also in a coma at the moment, but she is just exerting too much energy, which is not a big problem.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 188 soul recovery
item.description: After a rest, the people who were lucky to escape were silent or left a few words of comfort, and then all left the bloody and horrible place one by one. In this troubled world, whose life is not life, who can control whose life? Every day and night, in every strange and secluded place, is not the same scene staged? On Monday, the fairy and the little ring also left there.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 187 mad dog
item.description: After the monster catastrophe, from north to south, we can see the bleak scenery everywhere. There is no smoke in thousands of miles, and there is no voice in a hundred villages. In the north, because the days of tea poisoning are short, it is better. The more we go south, the more serious the scene is. Broken walls, towns, everywhere. Even in the open land beside the field, it is even more shocking to find the forest white bones from time to time.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 186 secret orders
item.description: In a blink of an eye, monkey Xiaohui has been back on the Dazhu peak for several days. During this period, it seems that he has been away from Dazhu peak for almost ten years. The monkey is still so familiar with the plants and plants here. All day, Xiao Hui and rhubarb are playing and running around. It seems that in the past few days, it seems that Xiaohui and rhubarb have become more and more lively.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 185 difficult passage
item.description: As usual countless days, the melodious morning bell rings again, reverberating between the Xumi mountains and in the misty mountain breeze. It has gone through countless years, and it will reverberate day after day in the future. Standing in the morning light, he stood with his hands and listened. He closed his eyes slightly, as if the bell was ringing to savor. At the moment, I don’t know why, his appearance has not changed much, but it seems that he has changed his personal feeling.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 184 punishment by heaven
item.description: On the jade wall without words, countless ancient and clumsy gold characters appeared. Such strange things are under the people of Puhong, and none of the monks in Tianyin temple have ever seen it. On the jade wall, there were auspicious rising and dark red flickering. The solemn golden light with strange and unpredictable red light gave people a feeling of breathlessness. In the middle of the sky, he looked up to the sky and screamed, and his eyes seemed to be very painful.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 183 wordless jade wall
item.description: The long bell, once again echoed in Xumi mountain, announced the beginning of a new day. Rising sun, from the eastern horizon out of a small halo, the first ray of sunlight sprinkled on the world. In the early morning, there are many people walking along the steps of the mountain road to the magnificent temple. Most of them are holding incense candles and offering sacrifices. They are full of piety.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 182 haze
item.description: Qingyun Mountain, Dazhu peak. It has been many days since the end of the battle of Qingyun. The battlefield, which once changed its color, has gradually become quiet. All traces of the war have been quietly erased in the process of people cleaning up. On that day, I don’t know how many people lost their friends and relatives. On Tongtian peak, I don’t know how many corpses were piled up. From the top of the mountain to the foot of the mountain, it was like the legendary underworld prison.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 181 resolution
item.description: The morning bell is long and the evening drum is heavy. The Xumi mountain is bathed in the misty clouds. From the rising sun to the dusk, the sky changes and the white clouds and dogs roll by. Time never stops for anyone. Tianyin temple is majestic and majestic. It stands on Xumi mountain like a compassionate giant looking at the world. Countless ordinary people come from all over the world in the early morning to worship the statues in the temple, telling their wishes of happiness or sorrow and praying for the blessing of gods.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 180 evil fate
Jade dynasty--Chapter 179 difficult passage through a bitter sea
item.description: The plain courtyard is just like the one outside. It is simply a room against the mountain wall. The middle path is paved with green bricks and leads to the door. There are grass on both sides. It seems that no one has taken care of it seriously. Weeds have grown in many places. Different from the outside, there is a heavy black curtain hanging on the door of this room.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 178 secular Buddha Hall
item.description: Morning bell, evening drum, day after day, as if endless. Every day is as like as two peas. Yesterday, some people feel boring. Some feel peaceful and quiet. In a twinkling of an eye, GUI Li has been in Tianyin temple for many days, listening to the bell in the morning and the drum in the evening. He rings from the unknown place in the temple every day on time to live in silence.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 177 Zen chamber
item.description: Thunder, lightning, strong wind, rainstorm, seem to have been howling in my ears all the time. The confusion and confusion in my mind seem to have confused me? Just in the intense pain, I feel a gust of wind and rain passing by, towards an unknown place. It seems that someone is talking. The voice is quite strange. It sounds a bit anxious and faintly hears: “there seems to be something wrong with him.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 176 man in black
item.description: Storm, still did not stop the appearance. In the dark, the little light swept, it is the magic weapon in the hands of Qingyun disciple, with the help of the magic weapon glimmer, searching in the wind and rain. This is close to the outside of Qingyun Mountain. It is densely forested with ancient trees and dense plants. In addition, the weather is extremely bad, and the sky is full of lightning and thunder.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 175 escape
item.description: The ancient sword of Zhuxian didn’t move. At that moment, it seemed that everyone held their breath, but the scene was quiet and terrible. There was no sound, no roar, and the ghost saw that the magic wand, which had been smashed by a thousand Jun, hit the ancient sword of Zhuxian, but suddenly fell into a pile of cotton and was silent. With the roar of rage, the figures at the end of the forest leaped.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 174 swallowing blood
item.description: Qingyun Mountain, Tongtian peak. In front of the magic moon cave, GUI Li, Lu Xueqi and Lin Jingyu stand opposite each other. The already delicate atmosphere suddenly seems to be stiff. All the attention of the three people instantly condenses on the ancient sword which is inserted upside down on the ground. legend of chusen! The legendary sword, which is famous all over the world, involves endless past events and determines the fate of many people.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 173
item.description: However, the scale of the fight between Lin Yu and his friends is not as big as that of his childhood. No one ever thought of it! The man who was once close to each other finally came to this point. The two men’s figures were scattered and sometimes collided. They swept around the magic moon cave like a storm. All the trees fell down, or were uprooted or cut off.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 172 divine sword
item.description: In the middle of the air, daoxuan real man’s brow was locked, and he faced the beast God in front of him, which was like a devil coming out of the nine hell hell hell. He was not only him, but also all the people in the right path under his feet, and they were all stunned. The monster in the air was as black as ink, and the muscles of its huge body curled up.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 171 monster
item.description: As time goes by, the overwhelming sword rain has already rushed to the beast God, and the strong wind blows on his face. At the same time, the figure of the beast god suddenly disappeared and disappeared in the black air. On the contrary, the evil spirit of the beast under him was full of black gas and jumped up. The skeleton of his whole body made a sound. Under the black air, it was even more terrible.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 170 witchcraft
item.description: Apart from the ancient forbidden area, there is no other noise except the sound of fighting and roaring from the distant mountains. There is a gentle mountain breeze, gently blowing from the distance, the green mountains shaking together, as if it is not the scenery of the world. Under the four strong characters of the magic moon cave, the simple stone wall outside the cave has peeled off a lot, as if recording endless years flowing here quietly.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 169 decisive battle
item.description: It seems to be a little embarrassed to see the evil spirits and monsters who have been severely damaged. Half of them are gray, while the other parts are blackened. They look strange and even funny. But in the laughter of those righteous disciples in the distance, the huge and terrifying monster slowly raised its head and suddenly let out a roar. The huge head opened its mouth, and a black air gushed out from it like a whirlwind, and rushed to the three in the air.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 168 red flame
item.description: The young man in the sky had no expression, and his eyes swept the battlefield under his feet. Even when he saw the huge monsters who had guarded him fall down one by one, he seemed to have no movement, as if he had seen through the life and death for a long time. When the wind blows, his figure slowly drops down from the dark clouds. The roar of beasts is more and more deafening.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 167 fate
item.description: Like the lightning tearing the night and falling into the human world, the light column that gathers the great power of the Dharma falls from the sky, falls from the top of the White Bone Demon snake, and goes straight in from the top of the head. In an instant, a huge force burst out from the huge body, and several Qingyun disciples swimming around were pushed far away by the invisible and qualitative air flow.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 166 forbidden areas
item.description: It looks like an endless torrent of monsters, which rush on like waves after wave. With those huge monsters as arrows, they hit the light curtain of people in the right way. Seeing the light curtain crumbling, it seemed that the young disciples’ faces were beginning to show some fear. Xiao Yicai frowned, knowing that if they didn’t repel these monsters, they would be out of control. Xiao Yicai immediately gave a big drink and called on the disciples around him.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 165 fighting
item.description: A strong smell of blood enveloped the Tongtian peak of Qingyun Mountain. Even the lazy water unicorn, the spirit beast of Zhenshan, seemed anxious at the moment, swimming back and forth in the cold water pool, making a low roar. But standing in the Yuqing hall, the noble people of the right path, one by one, looked at the foot of the mountain. After Hongqiao is the huge Yunhai square. At this moment, a fierce and cruel battle has been going on there for a day and a night.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 164 The Moon
item.description: “Master, what’s wrong with you? What happened… " Lin Jingyu rushes to Wan Jianyi’s side and kneels down. His hands are shaking and he wants to help him up. However, the place where he starts is soft, and a cold comes from his heart. Lin Jingyu seems to be in a bottomless ice cellar. Where he touches his hands, there is no bone in the old man that is complete.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 163 conspiracy
item.description: In the morning, the cool wind on Qingyun Mountain gently blows, turning the mist of a mountain slowly, like a gauze floating in the dense forest. Outside the ancestral hall of the three trigeminal Road, GUI Li, Mr. GUI and the old sweeper stand in a triangle, facing each other in a delicate atmosphere. The wrinkles on the old man’s face moved and his hoarse voice said slowly, “you are not from Qingyun Mountain.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 162 the Hermit
item.description: The rain stopped for the time being, but the dark clouds in the sky were still very low, layer by layer, which made people feel breathless. The north gate of Heyang city was opened, and countless people poured out of the city and went northward. Crying was heard all the way. No one knows where the road ahead is? Xiao Yicai led the disciples of Qingyun to maintain order all the way, constantly comforting the worried and panicked people, telling people around again and again that this time is just a temporary departure.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 161 loneliness
item.description: The low hissing and roaring came from all directions. On the plain 200 miles away from Qingyun Mountain, more and more strange beasts gathered in southern Xinjiang, and some of them kept roaring to the sky. Among the herds, there are six or seven monsters, which are especially huge, far more than the surrounding ordinary beasts. They are standing in the herd and roaring, and the surrounding demons seem to be particularly afraid of them.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 160 struggle
item.description: In the early morning, when the sky was just bright, the sky around Qingyun Mountain was covered with dark clouds, and rain drops soon fell. The rain increased from a small age, and soon became gray between the sky and the earth. The sound of rain was everywhere, enveloping the towering mountains in a water mist, which was hazy and mysterious. The sound of rain beating green bamboo leaves seems to have not changed for thousands of years, and it always seems lonely on Qingyun Mountain.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 159 Secrets
item.description: In the face of the ghost, although Mr. ghost still did not appear from the coffin, he was obviously more cautious. The ghost fire in the air was silent burning, and gradually became bright and bigger, reflecting the faces around him turning green. Staring at the dark green light, he stepped on a step without expression. Almost at the moment when the ghost’s body was moving, the ghost fire seemed to be stimulated by something, and suddenly it was full of light.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 158 ghost Road
item.description: Zhou Yixian and other three were shocked. In this gloomy night, they only felt that their backs were like thorns and their hair was standing up. A faint green fire in that room was burning quietly, and the light was slowly emanating from the cracks of the house. It was strange and unpredictable. With the sound of the night wind around, it was more and more like the sound of ghost crying.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 157 night exploration
item.description: The man in black standing at the door was a mysterious figure of the guiwangzong. The wild dog Taoist lived in the guiwangzong for a period of time after being taken over by the ghost. He had seen him several times. Although he still knew little about what Mr. ghost looked like, he understood that he was a very important person and was not a person he could compare with.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 156 worship
item.description: Xiao Yicai lowered his voice, and his face became a little dignified and said, “my teacher asked me to ask martial uncle, is everything still in good condition?” Tian is not easy to change his face. He suddenly stands up and stares at Xiao Yicai. Xiao Yicai also slowly stands up, but he takes a step back. Tian Bu Yi looks at Xiao Yi for a long time. His face changes constantly.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 155 former residence
item.description: Morning, another day. At the entrance of Sanfu Town, GUI Li stood face to face with the young man. Xiao Hui was lying on his shoulder, and the evil beast Taotie was following him, looking bored. The young man took a fierce look and said with a smile, “it’s rare to get together. I don’t know when to see you again. Take care of yourself.” “So are you,” he said

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 154 drinking at night
item.description: Huqishan, the ice stone chamber. GUI Li silently looks at the Biyao lying on the ice stone platform, the woman sleeping in the curling white smoke. The corner of her mouth seems to always have a trace of smile. Can she still feel at the moment, but does she know that someone is guarding her side? Or, in her heart, she had no regrets, so she fell asleep peacefully? He never knew the answer and didn’t dare to think about it.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 153 unfilial
Jade dynasty--Chapter 152 Purgatory
item.description: Huqishan, the main hall of the ghost King sect of the demon sect, is shrouded in a mass of killing. More than half of the original powerful sect’s staff suddenly died, which is a heavy blow to any powerful sect in the world. So many hot blooded disciples set out to fight with high morale, but when they came back, there was only one ghost king with bloody body. The lingering shadow appeared in the face and heart of everyone in Huqi mountain.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 151 madness
item.description: Huqi mountain is the main hall of ghost king. “Squeak, squeak!” Xiao Hui’s familiar cry sounded in the deep passage, and came out of the shadow. On his shoulder, Xiao Hui took the big wine bag and drank a few drinks. Then he cleverly tied up the mouth of the wine bag and dropped it down. There is a long and thin rope on the big wine bag, which is tied to the monkey like a condom.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 150 poison
item.description: Qingyun Mountain, Tongtian peak. The fragrance of tea curls from the white teacup with green mouth and green cover, and the freshly brewed tea wafts with white air and spreads in the room. This is a secluded room in the back hall of Yuqing hall. The three most powerful and famous people in the right way all gather in this room to enjoy tea business talks. It turns out that when the three disciples of Zhenren Lanyun and Qingyun have left the room to wait for tea, they have already left behind.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 149 civil strife
item.description: The night gradually darkened, immersed in the invisible tension, the snake Valley seems to be slowly into sleep, dim lights slowly extinguished, except for the lonely soul hall. The door of the shrine was still open, and the cold night wind blew through, blowing out the burning candles on the hall, casting strange shadows on the ground. In the distance outside, in the silence, it seems that there is something whispering, crying, laughing, and it seems that the wind is blowing the trees, which makes people not really listen to it, but feel a little chilly in their hearts.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 148 Alliance
item.description: Qingyun Mountain, Tongtian peak. Outside the Yuqing hall, there are a large group of people standing closely. Looking at the past, they are all people of the right path, including immortal daoxuan, the leader of Qingyun, and Yun Yilan, the master of Fenxiang valley. Behind the two of them, other well-known figures of Qingyun and Huoxiang are standing here. Judging from the situation, it seems that they are going to meet someone.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 147 poison trap
item.description: Thousands of miles away, is also the general night, that bright moon hanging in the sky, quietly looking at this earthly world. On the wilderness, there was also a man who looked up at the cold moon. His robe and long sleeves were still in Taoist costume. On his angular face, his momentum of not being angry but powerful was still vaguely visible. The night wind on the field is blowing, and the weeds are shaking.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 146 meeting
item.description: There was no sound, only the sound of branches bursting from time to time in the fire. The strange boy and the ghost didn’t speak any more. The flame was stretching and burning between them. The surface color of the roast pig gradually turned into gold, and a slight burning smell appeared in the rich aroma. At this time, the surface of the whole roast pig was covered with a transparent layer of light oil drops.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 145 chance encounter
item.description: The catastrophe started in spring and summer of that year. Thousands of years later, people in the world still remember clearly that period of horrible and crazy days. In the extreme south of Southern Xinjiang, among the 100000 mountains, countless monsters suddenly swarmed out. They were bloodthirsty, and they killed people whenever they saw people. There were also many evil beasts who were greedy for human flesh, and the places they passed were appalling.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 144 unwillingness
item.description: The forest gradually quieted down. A moment ago, the monsters who were still barking fiercely were scattered far away. The speed was so fast that Qinglong was really surprised. But in his mind, the reaction of the Golden Vase son when he saw this strange boy was even more elusive to him? The young man’s eyes fell on both of them. He looked at them carefully and said, “are you Chinese?

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 143 doomsday
item.description: Qingyunshan. Tongtianfeng, ancestral hall. The old man guarding the ancestral hall is still holding his broken broom in his hand, standing at the gate of the ancestral hall and looking out. There was a strange expression on the wrinkled face, which seemed to have some expectation and a little excitement. The open space outside the hall is empty, but if you look carefully, you will find that there are many strange Charms around the open space than usual.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 142 confusion
item.description: Gray light from the edge of the cold teeth gently radiated, passing the dog Taoist’s face. The man lying in front of him is the murderer who destroyed the blood refining hall. His eyes twinkled and he seemed to have some idea of fighting. However, this opportunity was once in a blue moon. What kind of person is the ghost in ordinary times? Taoist wild dog dare not think that he can kill this man.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 141 killing the opportunity
item.description: On the Yuqing hall, daoxuan real man, with a dark green robe and a long beard, sits on the throne of the hall. On both sides of the seats are the first seats of other veins of Qingyun. It can be said that during the battle of Qingyun Mountain ten years ago, three of the seven veins of Qingyun gate changed their first seats. Compared with the time when Zhang Xiaofan and Lin Jingyu just arrived at Qingyun, things are different.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 140 chance encounter
item.description: He put the dishes that had just come out of the pot and were still steaming on the table. Boss he returned to the back of the counter, opened the account book again and pretended to account, but his eyes turned slightly, and he looked at the customers in the shop from time to time. Zhou Yixian, Xiaohuan and the wild dog Taoist priest are all sitting on the table of the three eyed grey monkey Xiaohui.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 139 decadence
item.description: A hundred thousand mountains, an ancient cave. After the resurrection of the demon demon suppressing cave, the scene is quite different from that of the previous dark clouds and the howling wind. Although the sky is still dark, the black air gathered in the cave has dissipated, and the wind blowing from the cave has disappeared all year round. In addition to the still barren mountains, only the statue woman standing at the entrance of Zhenmo ancient cave is still standing there.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 138 the sad man
item.description: Huqishan, the general Hall of ghost king. It has been three days since the great wizard died. Qinglong has cremated the old man’s body and collected it in an urn of ashes. At the moment, the small blue and white urn was quietly placed on the table beside him. Qinglong gazed at the urn for a long time, sighed and turned away. In the past three days, Qinglong and Youji have been responsible for all the affairs in the ghost King’s clan.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 137 evoking souls
item.description: In the cold stone room, only the great wizard’s low breath. The ghost king and GUI Li stood in front of the weak old man, staring at his old face tightly. At the moment, the remaining life of the great wizard was their only hope. The great wizard gasped a little, raised his head, and laughed at them both. The ghost king was a little relieved. After pondering for a moment, the great wizard said to the ghost king, “please find some blood, and blood is the best way to attract ghosts.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 136 strange skills
item.description: Incense Valley, chamber of secrets. The primitive screen separated the space of the stone chamber. Shangguan CE, dressed in grey, stood quietly in place and waited patiently. After a long time, the old voice of Yun Yilan, the master of the incense burning Valley, came from behind the screen: “I heard that younger martial brother, this time you tracked down Jiuwei Tianhu, and at the last minute, you suddenly ordered all the disciples to withdraw.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 135 evil spirit
item.description: Two hundred Li to the north of “Xianyong mountain” in central Turkey is the tall “Huqi mountain”. Looking up from the foot of the mountain, you can see that the rock falls through the sky, which is abrupt and precipitous. However, there was no vegetation on the whole mountain, which was extremely desolate. On the left side of the mountain range, a river, called Shengshui, emerges from an underground spring in the middle of the mountain.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 134 Resurrection
item.description: The darkness is boundless, only the sound of the wind is more and more bleak. The Lich walked in the dark corridor of the ancient cave, just like a ghost walking towards the nine secluded places. The older the cave is, the wider it becomes, but the darkness around it grows deeper. Walking on this cold and terrible Road, the Lich can even close its eyes and walk forward. For many years, he wandered alone here, and now, he finally wants to change his own destiny.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 133 evil spirits
item.description: “Get out of my way! “The Lich was silent for a long time and said slowly. The evil spirit looked at him coldly and said, “don’t you regret before the goddess statue? " The Lich’s black clothes moved slightly again. It seemed that he was very excited under the black clothes. However, he did not look back to see the stone statue woman. “I’m right. My mother is wrong! “He said in an astringent voice.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 132 farewell
item.description: Qilidong, an altar of Miao nationality. The new day, as if even the sun shining on the altar platform, feel as if there is a new flavor. GUI Li and Xiao Bai stood on the platform in front of the altar in the middle of the mountain, looking at the land ravaged by the war. Among the ruins that can be seen everywhere, Miao people come in and go out. From a high point of view, they are like ants busy for their own homes.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 131 strange forest
Jade dynasty--Chapter 130 Legends
item.description: Qilidong, Miao people’s altar. Last night’s war did not seem to affect the atmosphere of silence here. Under the leadership of the young wizard, GUI Li and Xiao Bai walked silently in the altar. Lying on the shoulder of the small ash, now seems to be a lot of quiet, as if the surrounding solemn atmosphere, let it also be honest. Through the long corridor, to the stone house deep in the altar, the young wizard nodded slightly, did not say anything to them, turned around and walked away.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 129 tracking
item.description: The sky gradually brightened up, and the fire which had been burning for a night in the Seven Mile cave finally subsided. It’s just that after the flame burns, all that remains is broken walls and smoky black wood. Although the Dharma is high in humanity, he has been busy for a whole night, and there are some scorched marks on his body. Some disciples of the burning incense Valley who have a slightly lower level of Taoism also have some black ashes on their faces.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 128 heart
item.description: All of them, hold their breath. The figure, submerged in a huge white column of light, disappeared. The woman in white standing in the cloud may be over exerting! It was also a stumbling, no longer able to maintain balance, slowly fell down. But, but, where is the sudden laughter? It’s so desolate, but extraordinary! In the white light column, red as blood, the man was soaked in blood, like a maniac general, but out, looking up to the sky and howling.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 127 the Lich
item.description: The flame clouds in the sky gradually darkened, and ahetai was hidden in the dark clouds, and quickly and incomparably far away from qilidong. Half an hour later, when he was sure that no foreign people would follow him, he slowly fell down to the cloud, returned to the ground, and landed in a valley. At the moment, both the Li and the Miao are in a state of failure. However, ahetai seems not eager to find the remaining Li people.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 126 sadness
item.description: The flaming flame lights up the sky, and the gorgeous brilliance will shine like the day, even if it is a hundred miles away, you can still hear the roaring sound. Looking at the distant place where the flashing red light and fireballs interweave, a group of people stopped in amazement. More than one official in the burning incense Valley, led by Li Xun and Lv Shun, together with Lu Xueqi of Qingyun gate and FA Xiang of Tianyin temple, were watching the disorderly place on the ancient road 100 li away from qilidong.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 125 black fire
item.description: “Dong, Dong, Dong…” There was a knock on the door, but there was no one outside. Grimly frowned, walked over and opened the door. Standing at the door was a 13-4-year-old Miao boy with a childish look on his face. He carried a basket in his hand with some meat, wine and vegetables in the middle. It seems that the leader of tumagu clan sent someone to deliver food. The boy handed the basket over and nodded grimly, “thank you very much.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 124 the Li Nationality
item.description: Qilidong, the border area of Southern Xinjiang. Miao altar. Deep in the dark and silent hall, the still sober ghost and the great wizard did not speak. Only the burning fire made a crackling sound from time to time. In addition, in the quiet altar, there is a strange sound. Monkey Xiaohui was drunk, and now he was sleeping soundly and snoring. In the past, GUI Li was often with Xiao Hui, but he didn’t realize that Xiao Hui would snore when he was sleeping.

item.title: Jade dynasty--Chapter 123 the altar
item.description: GUI Li was stunned, but I saw the tenderness in Xiaobai’s eyes. He was so watery that he reflected his figure and face. He couldn’t help but jump in his heart. “You’re drunk.” When he said this, he couldn’t help but have a little sweat on his head.
